issue.title: [Java]: Create a sphinx plugin or java cookbook plugin to format code that appear on java cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15713](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15713). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a sphinx plugin or java cookbook plugin to format code that appear on java cookbook

Currently we are adding java code as a text and needed to enhance that to apply a format code

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15713?focusedCommentId=17496103) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Sphinx formatting should be based on https://pygments.org/ so it should already have support for `Java`. It might be a matter of just emitting the code in `.. code-block:: java` blocks
